title: Mongolia ignores an international warrant for Putin's arrest, giving him a red-carpet welcome
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin visited Mongolia and received a red-carpet welcome despite calls for his arrest on an international warrant for alleged war crimes in Ukraine. The visit underscores Mongolia's economic dependence on Russia and China, complicating its position as an ICC member obligated to detain suspects. Agreements were signed to enhance bilateral cooperation.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin visited Mongolia and received a red-carpet welcome despite calls for his arrest on an international warrant for alleged war crimes in Ukraine. The visit underscores Mongolia's economic dependence on Russia and China, complicating its position as an ICC member obligated to detain suspects. Agreements were signed to enhance bilateral cooperation.

title: Against banning Awami League, its arch-rival parties say
content: The BNP and Jamaat oppose banning the Awami League, despite being targeted by them previously. They prefer electoral defeat over bans. The interim government led by Muhammad Yunus is preparing for new elections after Sheikh Hasina resigned and fled to India amid prolonged protests over government job quotas.
summary: The BNP and Jamaat oppose banning the Awami League, despite being targeted by them previously. They prefer electoral defeat over bans. The interim government led by Muhammad Yunus is preparing for new elections after Sheikh Hasina resigned and fled to India amid prolonged protests over government job quotas.

title: Piers Morgan wonders whether Biden spoke to George Clooney after his 'hit job'
content: George Clooney now praising his old friend Biden and comparing him with George Washington will not salvage the damage that Clooney's NYT op-ed did, Piers Morgan said. Biden did not make a selfless sacrifice but was bullied, shamed and humiliated into doing it by his so-called friends like Clooney, Morgan wrote.
summary: George Clooney now praising his old friend Biden and comparing him with George Washington will not salvage the damage that Clooney's NYT op-ed did, Piers Morgan said. Biden did not make a selfless sacrifice but was bullied, shamed and humiliated into doing it by his so-called friends like Clooney, Morgan wrote.

title: Why Brittany Mahomes supporting Donald Trump is awkward for Taylor Swift
content: What makes this situation particularly awkward is Brittany Mahomes's rumoured friendship with Taylor Swift, whose political beliefs are well known. Swift broke her long-held silence on politics in 2018, endorsing Democratic candidates and speaking out on issues such as women’s rights, LGBTQ+ rights, and racial equality. This marked a significant departure from her previously neutral public persona and positioned her as a prominent voice against Trump’s policies. Her activism continued into the 2020 presidential election when she endorsed Joe Biden and Kamala Harris.
summary: What makes this situation particularly awkward is Brittany Mahomes's rumoured friendship with Taylor Swift, whose political beliefs are well known. Swift broke her long-held silence on politics in 2018, endorsing Democratic candidates and speaking out on issues such as women’s rights, LGBTQ+ rights, and racial equality. This marked a significant departure from her previously neutral public persona and positioned her as a prominent voice against Trump’s policies. Her activism continued into the 2020 presidential election when she endorsed Joe Biden and Kamala Harris.

title: Democrat Guv has a warning for Kamala Harris on debate with Trump: 'He won against Hilary, Biden'
content: “We shouldn’t be thinking that somehow Kamala Harris has a greater ability to win a debate than Donald Trump,” Pritzker continued. “They’re going to come in as significant rivals with very, very different points of view.” Donald Trump and Kamala Harris will face each other on September 10 in their first debate to be hosted by ABC News

title: What is ‘Founder Mode’? Is it inspired by Steve Jobs?
content: Paul Graham introduces 'Founder Mode,' advocating for startup founders to remain deeply involved in their companies rather than adopting traditional managerial roles. This approach promotes swift decision-making, preserves company culture, and fosters innovation but may face challenges as the company scales. It emphasizes direct communication and trust within the team.
summary: Paul Graham introduces 'Founder Mode,' advocating for startup founders to remain deeply involved in their companies rather than adopting traditional managerial roles. This approach promotes swift decision-making, preserves company culture, and fosters innovation but may face challenges as the company scales. It emphasizes direct communication and trust within the team.

title: Bangladesh floods leave 71 dead, fears of waterborne disease rise
content: The death toll from Bangladesh's floods has climbed to 71, leaving millions stranded and raising concerns about waterborne diseases. Triggered by monsoon rains, the disaster has impacted around five million people. Authorities focus on disease prevention and clean water supply. UNICEF appeals for $35 million to support affected children.
summary: The death toll from Bangladesh's floods has climbed to 71, leaving millions stranded and raising concerns about waterborne diseases. Triggered by monsoon rains, the disaster has impacted around five million people. Authorities focus on disease prevention and clean water supply. UNICEF appeals for $35 million to support affected children.

title: US to provide long-range missiles to Ukraine, delivery expected in months
content: The United States is finalizing an agreement to supply Ukraine with Joint Air-to-Surface Standoff Missiles (JASSM). These long-range cruise missiles could extend Ukraine's strike capabilities deep into Russia, altering the strategic landscape. An announcement about including JASSMs in a weapons package is expected this autumn, pending resolution of technical issues.
summary: The United States is finalizing an agreement to supply Ukraine with Joint Air-to-Surface Standoff Missiles (JASSM). These long-range cruise missiles could extend Ukraine's strike capabilities deep into Russia, altering the strategic landscape. An announcement about including JASSMs in a weapons package is expected this autumn, pending resolution of technical issues.

title: Larry the cat's 'Siberian rival': UK PM Starmer welcomes new kitten to Number 10 Downing Street
content: Larry the cat, Downing Street’s chief mouser for 13 years, is set to meet a new companion as Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s family brings in a Siberian kitten named JoJo. Despite Larry’s mixed performance in pest control, he remains popular. The new addition requires careful introduction to maintain harmony among the pets.
summary: Larry the cat, Downing Street’s chief mouser for 13 years, is set to meet a new companion as Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s family brings in a Siberian kitten named JoJo. Despite Larry’s mixed performance in pest control, he remains popular. The new addition requires careful introduction to maintain harmony among the pets.

title: Elon Musk reacts to potential role in Trump administration: 'Lot of waste in US government ...'
content: Elon Musk recently took to X to criticize government waste and unnecessary regulation, responding to a tweet about former President Donald Trump's consideration of involving business leaders like him in auditing federal agencies. Social media reactions were mixed, but Trump showed enthusiasm for the idea. He praised Musk's expertise in streamlining operations and reducing costs. Additionally, Musk proposed creating a government efficiency commission to oversee spending, which Trump supported.
summary: Elon Musk recently took to X to criticize government waste and unnecessary regulation, responding to a tweet about former President Donald Trump's consideration of involving business leaders like him in auditing federal agencies. Social media reactions were mixed, but Trump showed enthusiasm for the idea. He praised Musk's expertise in streamlining operations and reducing costs. Additionally, Musk proposed creating a government efficiency commission to oversee spending, which Trump supported.

title: Family of Indian woman who fell into Kuala Lumpur sinkhole performs final rituals at tragic site
content: The family of Vijaya Lakshmi Gali, who tragically fell into a sinkhole in Kuala Lumpur, visited the site for final rituals. The search for her body was called off after nine days. The family performed Hindu ceremonies and returned to India. Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim reassured the public about the safety of Kuala Lumpur for tourists.
summary: The family of Vijaya Lakshmi Gali, who tragically fell into a sinkhole in Kuala Lumpur, visited the site for final rituals. The search for her body was called off after nine days. The family performed Hindu ceremonies and returned to India. Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim reassured the public about the safety of Kuala Lumpur for tourists.

title: JD Vance’s Miss South Carolina joke on Kamala Harris backfires: ‘Try to have some fun,’ he tells outraged critics
content: JD Vance tried to mock Kamala Harris by posting a clip of Miss South Carolina Teen USA Caitlin Upton's 2007 pageant error. The tweet faced backlash for perceived sexism. Upton discussed the lasting negative effects on her life. Vance defended his post, highlighting the need for humor in politics.
summary: JD Vance tried to mock Kamala Harris by posting a clip of Miss South Carolina Teen USA Caitlin Upton's 2007 pageant error. The tweet faced backlash for perceived sexism. Upton discussed the lasting negative effects on her life. Vance defended his post, highlighting the need for humor in politics.

title: Government working on IMF conditions for loan programme: Pakistan PM Shehbaz
Russia says Telegram boss Durov is a victim of his own independence
content: Telegram CEO Pavel Durov was arrested in France and faces investigation for alleged involvement in illegal activities on his platform. Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov claims this is a Western political strategy. The Kremlin supports Durov, while French President Emmanuel Macron denies any political motives behind the arrest.
summary: Telegram CEO Pavel Durov was arrested in France and faces investigation for alleged involvement in illegal activities on his platform. Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov claims this is a Western political strategy. The Kremlin supports Durov, while French President Emmanuel Macron denies any political motives behind the arrest.

title: August deadliest month in Balochistan in six years, reports say
content: The Pakistan Institute for Conflict and Security Studies reported that August was the most violent month in Balochistan in six years. Across Pakistan, 254 people were killed primarily due to militant attacks. Quetta, Kech, Awaran, and Khuzdar experienced high numbers of enforced disappearances. The region faces ongoing violence and severe human rights abuses.
summary: The Pakistan Institute for Conflict and Security Studies reported that August was the most violent month in Balochistan in six years. Across Pakistan, 254 people were killed primarily due to militant attacks. Quetta, Kech, Awaran, and Khuzdar experienced high numbers of enforced disappearances. The region faces ongoing violence and severe human rights abuses.

title: Who is Lara Trump? Social media rips her singing: ‘She croaks like a frog’ - See why
content: Lara Trump, the wife of Eric Trump, released her new single 'Hero' on Labor Day. The tribute to emergency responders quickly went viral but faced severe backlash for its heavily auto-tuned sound. Social media users and political commentators harshly criticized the song, questioning her musical talent and decision to pursue singing.
summary: Lara Trump, the wife of Eric Trump, released her new single 'Hero' on Labor Day. The tribute to emergency responders quickly went viral but faced severe backlash for its heavily auto-tuned sound. Social media users and political commentators harshly criticized the song, questioning her musical talent and decision to pursue singing.

title: Hindu American silence: How Usha Vance’s faith shapes Trump-Vance campaign this US election
content: Usha Vance, wife of VP candidate JD Vance, discussed their interfaith marriage at the RNC but did not mention her Hindu upbringing due to online vitriol. While her presence may attract some Indian American voters, it highlights ongoing challenges for non-Christian identities within the Republican Party.
summary: Usha Vance, wife of VP candidate JD Vance, discussed their interfaith marriage at the RNC but did not mention her Hindu upbringing due to online vitriol. While her presence may attract some Indian American voters, it highlights ongoing challenges for non-Christian identities within the Republican Party.

title: Nasa identifies 'strange noises' from Starliner capsule as audio feedback
content: Astronaut Butch Wilmore reported hearing unusual noises from Boeing's Starliner capsule, which were identified as audio feedback from an audio configuration with the ISS. The issue did not impact operations. Wilmore and fellow astronaut Sunita Williams will return to Earth in February 2025 aboard SpaceX's Dragon capsule. Starliner will return uncrewed in September 2024.
summary: Astronaut Butch Wilmore reported hearing unusual noises from Boeing's Starliner capsule, which were identified as audio feedback from an audio configuration with the ISS. The issue did not impact operations. Wilmore and fellow astronaut Sunita Williams will return to Earth in February 2025 aboard SpaceX's Dragon capsule. Starliner will return uncrewed in September 2024.

title: Did Pavel Durov get plastic surgery? Telegram CEO’s jaw-dropping transformation sparks rumors amid arrest
content: Pavel Durov, Telegram’s co-founder and CEO, has recently been in the news due to his arrest in France and a significant change in his appearance. Side-by-side photos show a drastic transformation, sparking speculation about plastic surgery. This development coincides with legal issues involving Durov's app, intensifying media scrutiny.
summary: Pavel Durov, Telegram’s co-founder and CEO, has recently been in the news due to his arrest in France and a significant change in his appearance. Side-by-side photos show a drastic transformation, sparking speculation about plastic surgery. This development coincides with legal issues involving Durov's app, intensifying media scrutiny.

title: Optimum faces major outage in Metro New York: Over 9,000 users report mass internet disruption, frustration follow
content: A major service outage affected Optimum customers in Metro New York from 8 pm on Monday. The interruptions impacted thousands, with reports peaking at over 9,700 users. Customer service experienced significant delays. Optimum's support team acknowledged the problem on its official account, pledging efforts to restore services promptly but providing no estimated repair time.
summary: A major service outage affected Optimum customers in Metro New York from 8 pm on Monday. The interruptions impacted thousands, with reports peaking at over 9,700 users. Customer service experienced significant delays. Optimum's support team acknowledged the problem on its official account, pledging efforts to restore services promptly but providing no estimated repair time.
